assignments.description: Adds the order product to the list of order products in the sObject collection variable.
assignments.name: Add_Order_Product_to_List
assignments.label: Add Order Product to List

assignments.description:
Uses the quote’s or opportunity’s field values to assign field values to the order.
ACTION: Review the Order fields assigned and add/remove fields as needed.
If fields from another object are needed, you could add a Fast Lookup step prior to this step to read and store the fields in a separate sObject Variable to be used here.
assignments.name: Assign_Order_Fields
assignments.label: Assign Order Fields

assignments.name: Assign_Order_Product_Field_for_RLCS_Quote_Assignment
assignments.label: Assign Order Product Field for RLCS Quote Assignment

assignments.description:
Uses the quote line item’s or order’s field values to assign field values to the order product.
ACTION: Review the order product fields assigned, and add or remove fields as needed.
If you need fields from another object, use a Fast Lookup element to store the fields in another sObject variable before this element in the flow, and then assign the stored values to the order product here.
assignments.name: Assign_Order_Product_Fields
assignments.label: Assign Order Product Fields

assignments.name: Non_fixed_Assign_Order_Product_Field_for_RLCS_Quote_Assignment
assignments.label: Assign Order Product Field for RLCS Quote Assignment

assignments.description: Helper to control if the PO Number input field already exists in the database.
assignments.name: PONumberExistChangeFlagtoFalse
assignments.label: PONumberExistChangeFlagtoFalse

assignments.description:
Sets the order’s Status field to Activated.
Include this element if you want the new order to be Activated.
assignments.name: Set_Order_Status_to_Activated
assignments.label: Set Order Status to Activated

decisions.name: Assign_Order_Product_Field_for_RLCS_Quote_Decision
decisions.label: Assign Order Product Field for RLCS Quote Decision

rules.name: Assign_Order_Product_Field_for_RLCS_Quote_outcome
rules.label: Assign Order Product Field for RLCS Quote outcome

decisions.description: Check if the supplier is empty for each record.
decisions.name: checkEmptySupplier
decisions.label: checkEmptySupplier

decisions.description: Evaluates whether the sObject collection variable contains any order products.
decisions.name: Order_Product_List_Empty
decisions.label: Order Product List Empty?

decisions.description:
Evaluates whether an order has already been generated from the quote.
If an order has already been generated from the quote, a new order will not be generated.
decisions.name: OrderGenerated
decisions.label: Order Generated?

loops.description: Iterates through each quote line item in the sObject collection variable.
loops.name: Loop_Quote_Lines
loops.label: Loop Quote Lines

recordCreates.description: Uses the field values that are stored in the sObject variable to create an order.
recordCreates.name: Create_Order
recordCreates.label: Create Order

recordCreates.description: Uses the field values that are stored in the sObject collection variable to create order products.
recordCreates.name: Create_Order_Products
recordCreates.label: Create Order Products

recordLookups.description:
Looks up the account that’s related to the opportunity, and stores selected account field values in an sObject variable.
ACTION: Review the account fields retrieved, and add additional fields as needed to the sObject variable.
recordLookups.name: Get_Account_Fields
recordLookups.label: Get Account Fields

recordLookups.description:
Uses the Quote ID that was passed to the flow to look up the quote, and stores selected quote fields in an sObject variable.
ACTION: Review the quote fields retrieved, and add additional fields as needed to the sObject variable.
recordLookups.name: Get_Quote_Fields
recordLookups.label: Get Quote Fields

recordLookups.name: Get_Quote_Line_Item_without_Depot
recordLookups.label: Get Quote Line Item without Depot

recordLookups.description:
Looks up the quote line items that are related to the quote, and stores selected field values for each quote line item in the sObject collection variable.
ACTION: Review the retrieved quote line item fields, and add additional fields as needed to the sObject collection variable.
recordLookups.name: Get_Quote_Lines
recordLookups.label: Get Quote Lines

recordUpdates.description:
Uses the field values that are stored in the sObject variable to update the order.
Include this element if you want the new order to be Activated.
recordUpdates.name: Activate_Order
recordUpdates.label: Activate Order

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
We cannot create Order Items because of: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}


System Administrator has been notified.

fields.name: SupplierEmpty
fields.fieldText:
The Supplier must be selected before generate the Order!

Please check the Supplier field for all the Quote Line Items.

fields.name: displaysitemanager
fields.fieldText: No Site Manager on the Site record! Please go back on the Site page and include a site manager (contact).

fields.name: NoSICCodemsg
fields.fieldText: No Site SIC Code (primary) on the Site record! Please go back on the Site page and include the SIC Code.

fields.name: OrderAlreadyGenerated
fields.fieldText: Order already generated for this quote.

fields.name: displayCheckPONumber
fields.fieldText: The PO Number already exists! Please choose another one.﻿

fields.name: Quote_Line_Item_without_Depot_Details
fields.fieldText: Quote Line Item without Depot Details (Invalid)

fields.name: SiteNotAvailable
fields.fieldText: Site not available

fields.name: validationMessage
fields.fieldText: This order was not generated. Please address missing compliance information first.

variables.description: Helper to control if the PO Number input field already exists in the database.
variables.name: FlagPONumberExists
